db:abstract.db:para: The <QtMath> header file provides various math functions.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: These functions are partly convenience definitions for basic math operations not available in the C or Standard Template Libraries.
<Unknown command>pagekeywordsmath trigonometry qmath floor ceiling absolute sine cosine tangent inverse tan exponent power natural logarithm

db:section.db:title: qreal qAcos(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the arccosine of v as an angle in radians. Arccosine is the inverse operation of cosine.

db:section.db:title: qreal qAsin(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the arcsine of v as an angle in radians. Arcsine is the inverse operation of sine.

db:section.db:title: qreal qAtan2(qreal y, qreal x)
db:section.db:para: Returns the arctangent of a point specified by the coordinates y and x. This function will return the angle (argument) of that point.

db:section.db:title: qreal qAtan(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the arctangent of v as an angle in radians. Arctangent is the inverse operation of tangent.

db:section.db:title: int qCeil(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Return the ceiling of the value v.
The ceiling is the smallest integer that is not less than v. For example, if v is 41.2, then the ceiling is 42.

db:section.db:title: qreal qCos(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the cosine of an angle v in radians.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.1] double qDegreesToRadians(double degrees)
db:section.db:para: This function converts the degrees in double to radians.
Example:
This function was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.1] float qDegreesToRadians(float degrees)
db:section.db:para: This function converts the degrees in float to radians.
Example:
This function was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:section.db:title: qreal qExp(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the exponential function of e to the power of v.

db:section.db:title: qreal qFabs(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the absolute value of v as a qreal.

db:section.db:title: int qFloor(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Return the floor of the value v.
The floor is the largest integer that is not greater than v. For example, if v is 41.2, then the floor is 41.

db:section.db:title: qreal qLn(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the natural logarithm of v. Natural logarithm uses base e.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.4] quint32 qNextPowerOfTwo(quint32 value)
db:section.db:para: This function returns the nearest power of two greater than value. For 0 it returns 1, and for values larger than or equal to 2^31 it returns 0.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.4] quint32 qNextPowerOfTwo(qint32 value)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
This function returns the nearest power of two greater than value. For negative values it returns 0.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.4] quint64 qNextPowerOfTwo(qint64 value)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
This function returns the nearest power of two greater than value. For negative values it returns 0.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.4.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.4] quint64 qNextPowerOfTwo(quint64 value)
db:section.db:para: This function returns the nearest power of two greater than value. For 0 it returns 1, and for values larger than or equal to 2^63 it returns 0.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.4.

db:section.db:title: qreal qPow(qreal x, qreal y)
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of x raised to the power of y. That is, x is the base and y is the exponent.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.1] double qRadiansToDegrees(double radians)
db:section.db:para: This function converts the radians in double to degrees.
Example:
db:section.db:programlisting: double radians = M_PI double degrees = qRadiansToDegrees(radians)
db:section.db:para: This function was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.1] float qRadiansToDegrees(float radians)
db:section.db:para: This function converts the radians in float to degrees.
Example:
db:section.db:programlisting: float radians = float(M_PI) float degrees = qRadiansToDegrees(radians)
db:section.db:para: This function was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:section.db:title: qreal qSin(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the sine of the angle v in radians.

db:section.db:title: qreal qSqrt(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the square root of v. This function returns a NaN if v is a negative number.

db:section.db:title: qreal qTan(qreal v)
db:section.db:para: Returns the tangent of an angle v in radians.
